document_data.mainbody:
rint Sprigley was a reporter employed by Baldurs Mouth in the late 15 century DR.
Wrint was a charcoal-skinned deep gnome who wore tunics and hats of quality make.
In the , Wrint Sprigley penned The Baldurs Mouth Tavern Review column in the Baldurs Mouth Gazette. During the Absolute crisis, his quill targeted the Blushing Mermaid in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate. Wrint wandered the street near the tavern, mumbling the lines for the review. He criticized the establishment for its lack of direction and claimed that the Blushing Mermaids atmosphere was ruined by street wanderers.
